title: Broken Hero Part1
description: Adam works for a small private security company that are about to get in over their head. After pursuing his own agenda for revenge Adam discovers the hard way that he is not the only one searching the solar system for the six people that left him for dead. Just as he discovers the lead he has been waiting for, the company that he works for takes on a new assignment with far greater consequences for mankind.In the enlightened age where humanity has conquered the solar system and moved beyond the petty squabbling of their Earth born ancestors. The darker side of human nature still finds ways of asserting its self. Cadet Josephine Bex has almost finished her long hospital recovery, from what was reported as a training accident. There is only a handful of people that know what really happened, and those numbers are about to decrease.
author: Chris Hennessy
